name: Computer Projects
body:
#MAJOR PROJECTS

### CryptoGame

**Description**
> Learn. Play. Practice. Cryptography.

Cryptogame offers two things: Firstly, A suite of 20+ Cryptography related Tools for a broad selection of ciphers - from classical (Caesar, Vigenere, etc) to modern (RC4, DES and RSA). Secondly, A text-based Interactive Storyline which engages the user in a chapter-wise series of cipher challenges, on solving which, the player progresses towards solving a mystery. (2016, April)

_Link_
[CryptoGame Official Website](http://manansingh.github.io/crypto-game)


***


### Cryptolab - Offline

**Description**
Cryptolab offers a set of cryptography related tools using which teachers can demonstrate and students can practice various techniques from classical caesar to modern RC4, DES and RSA. The tools also display the immediate intermediate steps behind the processes of modern advanced techniques like RC4, DES Modes, etc. (2016, April)

_Links_
[Try online Demo](http://manansingh.github.io/Cryptolab-Offline/)
[Download](https://github.com/mananSingh/Cryptolab-Offline/archive/gh-pages.zip)


***


### YouTube Playlist Analyzer

**Description**
Cryptolab offers a set of cryptography related tools using which teachers can demonstrate and students can practice Youtube Playlist Analyzer uses Youtube Data API to analyze any youtube playlist or channel, and display the related information graphically. (2016, January)

_Link_
[Original Website](http://youtube-playlist-analyzer.appspot.com/)
[Mirror Site](http://youtube-api-test-1170.appspot.com/)
   
               

***   
***
***
***
***               

   

#MINI PROJECTS

### Good Thoughts

**Description**
"Good Thoughts" is an app that lets you explore, browse, and search the great words of wisdom (quotes & thoughts) of the seer saint Shriram Sharma Acharya. (2015, October)

_Links_
[Site](http://good-thoughts.appspot.com/)


***


### Raghav Yadaviyam

**Description**
Raghav Yadaviyam is an app that lets you interactively read the 30 verses of Shri Raghav Yadaviyam, by flipping various 'cards'; enjoying the beautiful design of the app and extreme wonder of this Sanskrit work. (2015, October)

_Links_
[Site](http://raghav-yadav.appspot.com/)


***


### Interest Profiler - Holland Code

**Description**
Know your interest profile (or Holland Code) by taking a 1 minute questionnaire/test/survey, and choose career more wisely. (2015, October)

_Links_
[Site](http://interest-profile.appspot.com/)


***


### CS Trek

**Description**
CS TREK is a web experiment which introduces Computer Science's core concepts along, and analogous to a small space trip. It offers an 'INTO'-parallax scrolling experience; unlike ever before, on the web, using just css3 and skrollr.js. The illusion of 3D space travel is created as you scroll. (2014, June)

_Links_
[Site](http://www.cs-trek.appspot.com/)


***


### FIFA 5S

**Description**
FIFA 5S is a web experiment which, in a brilliant way, presents the FIFA's 5-'S's that lead to success IN GAME & IN LIFE. It uses css3 and skrollr.js for creating a gorgeous blend of parallax and animation effects, as you scroll. Works best in Mozilla Firefox. (2014, June)

_Links_
[Site](http://www.fifa-5s.appspot.com/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
